attributes.action: replace his glass eye with a red LED one in order to resemble a T-800 model Terminator.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After Conservative MEP Daniel Hannan likened Mr Brown’s current political state to that of the Terminator's indestructible like tendencies, I believe Mr Brown should fully live up to this comparison and replace his current glass eye with a red LED one.

The benefits of this would be great for Mr Brown’s image, the public would feel comforted that a cyborg assassin was watching over them at night and our current enemies in the war on terror would no doubt surrender in the face of a Terminator.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
